text: KLLN (90.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Newark, Arkansas. The station is owned by the Cedar Ridge School District. The station was assigned the KLLN call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on June 13, 1983. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * LLN Category:Radio stations established in 1986 Category:1986 establishments in Arkansas Category:High school radio stations in the United States Category:Independence County, Arkansas
title: KLLN
